3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located right across from Oracle Park, Towers is a luxury condo development in South Beach, a neighborhood of San Francisco. Residence 112 features a two-level, 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms with a walkout patio, an open floor plan, wood floors, expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, lots of built-in storage, and a washer/dryer. Open to the living area is the kitchen equipped with Subzero and stainless-steel appliances paired with contemporary cabinetry. On the second level, you will find the primary bedroom with an en suite bath, a large walk-in closet, and an additional den perfect for work at home. The condo comes with 1 car parking and the storage is located on the same floor. Residents of The Towers can enjoy Five-star level amenities such as a pool/spa, gym, BBQ and fireplace, business/conference center, entertainment room, concierge, and 24-hour security. The location is unbeatable, with easy access to shopping, entertainment, 280, Caltrain, Mission Bay, Downtown, and the Bay Bridge.
Confidential Remarks: Pre-escrow open with Michael Yip at Chicago Title. Please use SFAR purchase agreement along with proof of funds when submitting an offer.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Premier Living at THE BRANNAN. Residence 4J is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath home with an ideal split floor plan layout. Open kitchen, dining/living area with elegant hardwood floors and large sliding glass doors that reveal a Juliette balcony. The spacious primary suite has 2 large closets and an ensuite bathroom. Large guest room with a guest bath that includes a large in-unit washer/dryer. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including Fisher & Paykel refrigerator, Samsung gas range, and Bosch dishwasher. Additional amenities included with the home are 1 car parking and a large storage unit. THE BRANNAN is one of South Beach's most prestigious addresses with common areas designed by renowned European interior designer Christian Liaigre. 24 hour lobby attendant, spa-like outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, concierge, and an onsite property manager. Close to Oracle Park, South Park, The Embarcadero, The Ferry Building, Chase Center, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Safeway, Blue Bottle Coffee, world class shopping and restaurants, freeways, transportation and The Bay Bridge and much much more

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Price improvement! Enjoy resort style living in the best South Beach location! The Towers at 88 King offers an outdoor pool and spa, bbq area, lush sheltered courtyard, gym overlooking the Marina, and 24-hr. door person. The proximity to the Embarcadero and Oracle Park provides a lifestyle geared to walking, biking, kayaking and sailing, as well as shopping and dining at iconic San Francisco restaurants. The north tower condo gets abundant natural light and has views of Downtown, the Bay Bridge, and Twin Peaks. A spacious living room/dining area opens onto a balcony perfect for morning coffee or evening wine while watching the lights come up over the City and Bay. The open kitchen features a breakfast bar, wine cooler, stainless appliances, and granite countertops. The large primary bedroom has space for an office nook, downtown views, a limestone bath with a washer/dryer, and a walk-in closet. The second bedroom has outlooks to the view balcony. A second full bath accommodates guests. Cherry hardwood floors, carpeted bedrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows, and freshly painted throughout. One car parking and storage included. Easy to show by appointment with advanced notice.
Confidential Remarks: Text Marsha for appointments at (415) 533-1894. HOA must be notified, so please give some advanced notice, especially if you want to show on the weekends other than the Open House.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Top floor, contemporary and sophisticated, South Beach luxury loft at 200 Brannan flooded with natural light and overlooking the Zen garden. Loft 421 offers an open floor plan with 2 enclosed bedrooms (one on each level) 2 full baths, an open kitchen area leading to your dining room and one of two living room spaces highlighted by soaring 17' floor-to-ceiling windows. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Introducing an extraordinarily rare opportunity to own a large scale penthouse at The Brannan, San Francisco's premier luxury high-rise. This exclusive city retreat features three bedrooms and three full baths, with exquisitely detailed and custom design work throughout. Beautifully crafted Herringbone wood floors, and custom millwork ceilings are met by 11 foot sparkling glass walls & windows showcasing front row views of the Bay Bridge and San Francisco skyline from every primary room in the home. The gourmet kitchen hosts top-of-the-line Viking & Bosch appliances, sleek modern cabinetry, and opens directly onto the grand living space; featuring a warm gas fireplace & stone mantle and a wrap around walk out terrace just above the cloud line. All three bedrooms are ample in size, featuring stunning custom built in shelving and desk space, fashioned wallpaper & stunning floor to ceiling windows. Tucked at the quiet end of the home sits the elusive primary suite, showcasing an oversized walk-in wardrobe, and an elite spa like bath. The Brannan is a full-service luxury building and true neighborhood in the sky. A full-service South Beach building with 24/7 lobby attendance & security

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 200 Brannan St #355 - a modern loft that seamlessly blends elements like exposed concrete with dramatic Bay Bridge views from both levels. A focal point of the residence are the floor to ceiling windows in the living room & primary bedroom, ensuring spectacular outlooks throughout the day. The kitchen is well-appointed with stainless steel appliances & backsplash that leads to the open concept dining & living areas. Completing this level is a private guest bedroom & 2nd bathroom. A metal staircase leads to the oversized lofted area, which is perfectly suited as an additional living space or entertainment area. Double doors lead to the primary bedroom with large windows framing views of the Bay Bridge. The spa-like primary bathroom includes a dual vanity, walk-in shower, separate soaking tub, & extensive walk-in closet with custom organizers. Completing this home is in-unit laundry, A/C, motorized shades, & 1-car parking. 200 Brannan is a coveted building offering a 24/7 attended lobby, fitness center, landscaped courtyard, & on-site property management. This incredible South Beach location is surrounded by dining & entertainment options including Oracle Park, Chase Center, South Park, the Ferry Building, freeway access, & much more. This is the one!

A metal staircase leads to the oversized lofted area, which is perfectly suited as an additional living space or entertainment area. Double doors lead to the primary bedroom with large windows framing views of the Bay Bridge. The spa-like primary bathroom includes a dual vanity, walk-in shower, separate soaking tub, & extensive walk-in closet with custom organizers. Completing this home is in-unit laundry, A/C, motorized shades, & 1-car parking. 200 Brannan is a coveted building offering a 24/7 attended lobby, fitness center, landscaped courtyard, & on-site property management. This incredible South Beach location is surrounded by dining & entertainment options including Oracle Park, Chase Center, South Park, the Ferry Building, freeway access, & much more. This is the one!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Very special and rare corner floor plan with generous open living space at The Brannan. Unit 4J offers just under 1600 square feet with TWO split primary suites, 2.5 baths (2 ensuite), downtown skyline views to the North and resort-like setting overlooking the beautiful heated lap pool to the West. Wonderful natural light. Brand new Wolf Range, Sub-Zero refrigerator, new dishwasher, gorgeous newer hardwood flooring, new carpet in both bedrooms and fairly new HVAC. The Brannan's interior was designed by French Interior Designer Christian Liaigre and inspired by the historic San Francisco Waterfront. The Brannan offers a full service of luxury amenities that include 24-hr security, a door person in each tower, heated 75 ft. lap pool, jacuzzi, gym/fitness center, concierge services, spa & BBQ area and 1 car parking. Located 1 block from the Embarcadero Waterfront, close to Ferry Building Plaza, Farmers Market, Oracle Park (Giants), Chase Center (Warriors), Caltrain, shops, world-class restaurants and close to all forms of transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Immerse yourself in contemporary luxury living at The Brannan. This sophisticated corner residence, infused with natural light, offers breathtaking views from Oracle Park to Twin Peaks and the City skyline. 10D features a desirable floorplan that offers maximum privacy with two generously sized bedrooms, each with ensuite baths and ample closet space positioned at opposite corners of the home. Stunning views provide the backdrop for the home's seamlessly integrated open-plan kitchen, dining, and living areas. The private balcony extends from the kitchen and living space. Elegant wood floors grace the bedrooms and living areas, while custom built-ins and walk-in closet offer ample storage solutions. The home's amenities elevate the urban living standard, including air conditioning, in-home laundry, deeded storage, and 1-car parking. Experience a resort-style lifestyle with access to The Brannan's distinctive amenities, including a large outdoor pool, hot tub, cabana with barbecue & kitchen, state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga area, bicycle storage, 24-hour security, on-site mgmt, and concierge services. Ideally situated in South Beach, this residence offers easy access to Oracle Park, Chase Center, the Ferry Building, Caltrain, and various transportation options.

Perfectly located for the urban explorer, sports lover, frequent flyer or commenter. Experience the epitome of urban living in this exquisite condo, where luxury meets convenience in the heart of the city.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Discover luxury living in this rarely available 3 bedroom, 2 bath home at 88 King. Situated on the 4th floor, this home offers views of the South and East Bay, the Embarcadero, South Beach Marina, and Oracle Park. The floor-to-ceiling windows highlight the views and flood the space with natural light. And the large patio provides a place to enjoy it all from. The custom kitchen, created by the renowned Canadian firm, Neff, features functional veneer cabinetry and an elegant aesthetic. The stainless-steel countertops and integrated trough sink compliment top-of-the-line Miele stove-top, oven, and chef's hood range, and a Sub-Zero refrigerator. Living at 88 King means not just investing in a property but embracing a lifestyle that includes 24/7 concierge/security, a well-equipped fitness center, heated pool, jacuzzi, BBQ, saunas, and a conference room and business center. Muni metro is steps away, CalTrain and Safeway are a quick 2 block walk and I-80 and 280 are both easily accessible. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exceptional property your own and experience city living at its finest!
Confidential Remarks: Will be open on Sunday, 4/28 from 2:00-4:00pm. Meet in lobby. There is a Giants' game starting at 1:05. 90 minute free parking available at Safeway on King at 4th with $5 purchase.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Remarks Enjoy a life of luxury - fine dining, trendy nightlife, and spa-like amenities - in your waterfront casa where South Beach meets the marina. Paint the town at night, then spend a slow morning sipping your coffee on your balcony as the sun rises over the Bay. Take the dogs to any of the nearby parks or check out some of San Francisco's favorite trails, then hit the farmer's market on your way home. Choose an evening outfit from your many walk-in closets so you can wow your friends tonight. Treat them to a home cooked meal from your modern kitchen with its anchored granite countertops and bar seating and entertain them in the loft-like living and dining areas where soaring 2-story windows look out on the private patio. After dinner, you'll cross the street to catch a fun Giants game, and tomorrow will be all relaxation. This building has it all - a gym, pool, spa, and sauna, plus an outdoor fire pit and a communal garden with treelined views of the ballpark.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Water view 2BR+office / 2BA at The Brannan. Timeless, luxurious and elegant as ever, The Brannan continues to be among the most respected, well-managed, pristinely-maintained luxury towers in the city. This spacious, light-filled South Beach view residence is sure to please the most discerning of buyers. The floor plan of this home is remarkable & versatile. The renovated kitchen features a 5-burner Wolf range with hood; and the spa-like bathrooms were renovated more recently with designer finishes. Each room has custom-crafted built-ins, motorized window coverings & more. The interior storage space is abundant, with custom closet systems throughout; including several walk-in closets. The living area, both bedrooms and balcony overlook the inspiring San Francisco Bay & the beautiful pool area. The separate office area is perfect for those who work from home. This flex area can also serve as a nursery. In-unit laundry, 1-car parking and a large deeded storage space at the garage level. The common areas are impressive & stunning. Building amenities include a full-length pool, hot tub, well-equipped gym; and door person for packages and security. This location provides easy access to The Embarcadero, Ferry Building, restaurants, highways for commuting, and CalTrain.
